subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: For perhaps the first time ever at the university, the buzz at UConn is about football, after the Huskies defeated No. 11 South Florida on Saturday for the program’s first victory over a ranked team.
snippet: For perhaps the first time ever at the university, the buzz at UConn is about football, after the Huskies defeated No. 11 South Florida on Saturday for the program’s first victory over a ranked team.
